definition: an annular eclipse of the sun
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: It is this effect that leads to the difference between total and annular eclipses.
sentences.chinese: 正是這個原因導致了日全食和日環食的區別。

sentences.english: Chen said the annular eclipse will end at Jiaodong peninsula in China.
sentences.chinese: 程卓稱日環食將在中國的膠東半島結束。

sentences.english: In an annular eclipse, the moon appears smaller than the sun.
sentences.chinese: 日環食產生之時，玉輪看上去比太陽要小。

sentences.english: Such events, which only blot out the middle of the Sun, are known as annular eclipses.
sentences.chinese: 像這樣，太陽中部被遮蓋的天象，就叫做日環食。
